markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Archon](/Traits.aspx?ID=13)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Members of this family of [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) are the protectors of [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=17) and are lawful good. They have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) and a weakness to evil damage.
name: Archon

Members of this family of  celestials  are the protectors of  Heaven  and are lawful good. They have  darkvision  and a weakness to evil damage.
